spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout and room sequence match the 2D plan well. However, door swings are not clearly defined or aligned with the source plan, and the balcony attached to the Master Bedroom is missing its outdoor furniture and clear perimeter definition.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent adherence to structural constraints. All rooms accounted for, roof is correctly removed, and no text or UI elements are present. Floating model on dark background is perfectly executed.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is highly accurate, specifically in the living/dining area and bedrooms. The scale of the kitchen block and utility area is consistent with the 2D measurements.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect execution of the requested low-poly, clay-like style with flat shading. The isometric orthographic camera angle is precise and centered.

detected_errors.description: Missing outdoor furniture on the primary balcony.
Minor distortion in the proportions of the entrance passage compared to room 3.05x4.15.
